name: Phaser
description: This algorithm is based on the Phaser algorithm on the disting mk4. It’s a classic phaser effect, using a number of all-pass filters to introduce notches into the audio’s frequency spectrum. You may like to apply an LFO to the sweep CV input.
gui_description: Parameter controls for sweep, stages, feedback, warp, input scale, mix, and level. Routing parameters include sweep CV bus selection, audio input/output routing, and width (number of busses).

parameters.name: Sweep
parameters.description: Sweeps the all-pass filters over the audio spectrum.

parameters.name: Stages
parameters.description: Sets the number of all-pass filter stages.

parameters.name: Warp
parameters.description: If enabled, warps the sweep parameter/CV for a more perceptually linear sweep.

parameters.name: Sweep_input
parameters.description: The bus to use for the sweep CV.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The number of busses to process, starting from the Input. For example, for a stereo signal, set this to 2.

output_ports.name: Output
output_ports.description: The first output bus for processed signal.
